00072 /******************************************************************************/

00074         link_interface = link_interface;
00075 }
00076 /******************************************************************************/
00077 layer_link_t *net_get_link_interface() {

00080 /******************************************************************************/
00081 int net_initialize(char *config_file, layer_link_t *layer_link) {
00082         
00083         link_interface = layer_link;
00084         
00085         if (lnp_configure(config_file) == LNP_ERROR) {
00086                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error initializing lnp.");
00087                 return LINK_ERROR;
00088         }
00089 
00090         /*if (lnp_sessions_initialize() == LNP_ERROR) {
00091                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error initializing sessions.");
00092                 return LINK_ERROR;
00093         }
00094 
00095         if (lnp_nodes_initialize() == LNP_ERROR) {
00096                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error initializing nodes.");
00097                 return LINK_ERROR;
00098         }
00099         
00100         if (lnp_info_initialize() == LNP_ERROR) {
00101                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error initializing nodes.");
00102                 return LINK_ERROR;
00103         }*/
00104         
00105         if (lnp_id_initialize() == LNP_ERROR) {
00106                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error loading key pair.");
00107                 return LINK_ERROR;
00108         }
00109 
00110         if (lnp_queue_initialize() == LNP_ERROR) {
00111                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error initializing queue.");
00112                 return LINK_ERROR;
00113         }
00114         
00115         if (lnp_routing_table_initialize() == LNP_ERROR) {
00116                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error initializing routing table.");
00117                 return LINK_ERROR;
00118         }
00119 
00120         if (lnp_create_threads() == LNP_ERROR) {
00121                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error creating threads.");
00122                 return LINK_ERROR;
00123         }
00124         
00125         link_interface->link_register_connect(lnp_link_connect_handler);
00126         link_interface->link_register_close(lnp_link_close_handler);
00127         
00128         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "lnp module initialized.");
00129         
00130         return LINK_OK;
00131 }
00132 /******************************************************************************/
00133 void net_finalize() {
00134         
00135         lnp_destroy_threads();
00136         lnp_queue_finalize();
00137         //lnp_sessions_finalize();
00138         //lnp_nodes_finalize();
00139         //lnp_info_finalize();
00140         //lnp_unconfigure();
00141         
00142         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "lnp module finalized.");
00143 }
